channel.title: Comments on: Activity Monitor to gather statistics and health of SQL Server 2008

item.title: By: Best Smartphones

item.content:encoded:
Hi Ted,

I’ve read the code. Much appreciated.

Kind regards,

John

item.title: By: Dave
item.dc:creator: Dave
item.description: Thanks for sharing some of this code it was just what I was looking for it helped me finish off a project that I was struggling with for ages.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for sharing some of this code it was just what I was looking for it helped me finish off a project that I was struggling with for ages.

item.title: By: James Edwards
item.dc:creator: James Edwards
item.description: Very nice post, thanks for sharing, are you able to do the same thing for Linux based MySQL, do you have any reasons my you prefer MS SQL over that of MySQL? Thanks.
item.content:encoded: Very nice post, thanks for sharing, are you able to do the same thing for Linux based MySQL, do you have any reasons my you prefer MS SQL over that of MySQL? Thanks.
